segments.pli: Aṅguttara Nikāya 10
segments.en: Numbered Discourses 10

segments.pli: 2. Nāthavagga
segments.en: 2. A Protector

segments.pli: 15. Appamādasutta
segments.en: 15. Diligence

segments.pli: “Yāvatā, bhikkhave, sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuppadā vā bahuppadā vā rūpino vā arūpino vā saññino vā asaññino vā nevasaññināsaññino vā, tathāgato tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho;
segments.en: “Mendicants, the Realized One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha, is said to be the best of all sentient beings—be they footless, with two feet, four feet, or many feet; with form or formless; with perception or without perception or with neither perception nor non-perception.

segments.pli: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te appamādamūlakā appamādasamosaraṇā. Appamādo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati. (1)
segments.en: In the same way, all skillful qualities are rooted in diligence and meet at diligence, and diligence is said to be the best of them.

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yāni kānici jaṅgalānaṃ pāṇānaṃ padajātāni, sabbāni tāni hatthipade samodhānaṃ gacchanti, hatthipadaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ mahantattena;
segments.en: The footprints of all creatures that walk can fit inside an elephant’s footprint, so an elephant’s footprint is said to be the biggest of them all.

segments.pli: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te appamādamūlakā appamādasamosaraṇā. Appamādo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati. (2)
segments.en: In the same way, all skillful qualities are rooted in diligence and meet at diligence, and diligence is said to be the best of them.

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, kūṭāgārassa yā kāci gopānasiyo sabbā tā kūṭaṅgamā kūṭaninnā kūṭasamosaraṇā, kūṭo tāsaṃ aggamakkhāyati;
segments.en: The rafters of a bungalow all lean to the peak, slope to the peak, and meet at the peak, so the peak is said to be the topmost of them all.

segments.pli: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te appamādamūlakā appamādasamosaraṇā. Appamādo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati. (3)
segments.en: In the same way, all skillful qualities are rooted in diligence and meet at diligence, and diligence is said to be the best of them.

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci mūlagandhā, kāḷānusāriyaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati;
segments.en: Of all kinds of fragrant root, spikenard is said to be the best.

segments.pli: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave … pe …. (4)
segments.en: In the same way …

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci sāragandhā, lohitacandanaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati;
segments.en: Of all kinds of fragrant heartwood, red sandalwood is said to be the best.

segments.pli: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave … pe …. (5)
segments.en: In the same way …

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci pupphagandhā, vassikaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati;
segments.en: Of all kinds of fragrant flower, jasmine is said to be the best.

segments.pli: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave … pe …. (6)
segments.en: In the same way …

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci khuddarājāno, sabbe te rañño cakkavattissa anuyantā bhavanti, rājā tesaṃ cakkavattī aggamakkhāyati;
segments.en: All lesser kings are vassals of a wheel-turning monarch, so the wheel-turning monarch is said to be the foremost of them all.

segments.pli: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave … pe …. (7)
segments.en: In the same way …

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yā kāci tārakarūpānaṃ pabhā, sabbā tā candappabhāya kalaṃ nāgghanti soḷasiṃ, candappabhā tāsaṃ aggamakkhāyati;
segments.en: The radiance of all the stars is not worth a sixteenth part of the moon’s radiance, so the moon’s radiance is said to be the best of them all.

segments.pli: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave … pe …. (8)
segments.en: In the same way …

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, saradasamaye viddhe vigatavalāhake deve ādicco nabhaṃ abbhussakkamāno sabbaṃ ākāsagataṃ tamagataṃ abhivihacca bhāsate ca tapate ca virocati ca;
segments.en: After the rainy season the sky is clear and cloudless. And when the sun rises, it dispels all the darkness from the sky as it shines and glows and radiates.

segments.pli: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave … pe …. (9)
segments.en: In the same way …

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yā kāci mahānadiyo, seyyathidaṃ—gaṅgā, yamunā, aciravatī, sarabhū, mahī, sabbā tā samuddaṅgamā samuddaninnā samuddapoṇā samuddapabbhārā, mahāsamuddo tāsaṃ aggamakkhāyati;
segments.en: All the great rivers—that is, the Ganges, Yamunā, Aciravatī, Sarabhū, and Mahī—flow, slant, slope, and incline towards the ocean, and the ocean is said to be the greatest of them.

segments.pli: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te appamādamūlakā appamādasamosaraṇā. Appamādo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti. (10)
segments.en: In the same way, all skillful qualities are rooted in diligence and meet at diligence, and diligence is said to be the best of them.”

segments.pli: Pañcamaṃ.
